title: Bugsplat and Ranked
body:
If I have been bugsplatted / have corrupt files, queue up for a rank game, and then have to reinstall. Will I get a leaverbuster / penalty? It seems rather unfair that the game screwed up with files and now I may have to take the blame for a loss.

What are the penalties, and what are the possible solutions?

replies.body:
Regardless of intention, disconnecting from a match for any reason negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is why disconnections of any kind are treated the same and why penalties cannot be modified. Continuous disconnections from matches can land you in a 5-game 20min low-priority queue.

Potential fixes for this are likely ensuring League has the right admin privileges with our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) before [running a repair of the game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5). Let me know if those steps resolved your issues.
